page.title: 13Uyeasound Playpark.
page.content: The Playpark is just below the school.It was built in 1984.The school children told the Community Council what equipment they would like. In the Playpark is a slide and a swing which is a tyre fastened to a log by four chains.The aerial slide is a piece of wire with a tyre fastened to it.The crow's nest is a metal basket fastened to a pole with a rope ladder and a net to climb up.There is also a rocking horse. I like the swing best because you can go awful high and you can bump into a tyre when you go a certain way. There was only a rocking horse for the Playgroup so they bought a set of swings made up of two single swings and one for two children sitting opposite each other.
